# Feature Details Docs

- [WCF feature details](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/index.md): Learn in detail about the extensive control that WCF offers over the messaging functions of an application.
- [WCF and Internationalized Domain Names](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/wcf-and-internationalized-domain-names.md): Learn more about: WCF and Internationalized Domain Names
- [Error handling](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/error-handling.md): Learn more about: Error handling in Windows Communication Foundation (WCF)

## Accessing Services Using a WCF Client

- [Accessing Services Using a WCF Client](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/accessing-services-using-a-client.md): Learn more about: Accessing Services Using a Client
- [How to: Access Services with One-Way and Request-Reply Contracts](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-access-wcf-services-with-one-way-and-request-reply-contracts.md): Learn more about: How to: Access WCF Services with One-Way and Request-Reply Contracts
- [How to: Access Services with a Duplex Contract](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-access-services-with-a-duplex-contract.md): Learn more about: How to: Access services with a duplex contract
- [How to: Access a WSE 3.0 Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-access-a-wse-3-0-service-with-a-wcf-client.md): Learn more about: How to: Access a WSE 3.0 Service with a WCF Client
- [How to: Use the ChannelFactory](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-use-the-channelfactory.md): Learn how to create a channel factory to create more than one channel for accessing services by using a WCF client.
- [Channel Factory and Caching](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/channel-factory-and-caching.md): Learn more about: Channel Factory and Caching
- [How to: Call Service Operations Asynchronously](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-call-wcf-service-operations-asynchronously.md): Learn how to create a WCF client that can access a service operation asynchronously by using the event-driven asynchronous calling model.
- [Middle-Tier Client Applications](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/middle-tier-client-applications.md): Learn more about: Middle-Tier Client Applications
- [How to: Call Operations Asynchronously Using a Channel Factory](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-call-operations-asynchronously-using-a-channel-factory.md): Learn more about: How to: Call Operations Asynchronously Using a Channel Factory
- [Accessing WCF Services with a Windows Store Client App](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/accessing-wcf-services-with-a-windows-store-client-app.md): Learn more about: Access WCF Services with a Windows Store Client App
- [How to: Create a Channel Factory and Use it to Create and Manage Channels](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-create-a-channel-factory-and-use-it-to-create-and-manage-channels.md): Learn more about: How to: Create a Channel Factory and Use it to Create and Manage Channels

## AJAX Integration and JSON Support

- [AJAX Integration and JSON Support](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/ajax-integration-and-json-support.md): Learn more about: AJAX Integration and JSON Support
- [Creating WCF AJAX Services without ASP.NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/creating-wcf-ajax-services-without-aspnet.md): Learn more about: Creating WCF AJAX Services without ASP.NET
- [How to: Migrate AJAX-Enabled ASP.NET Web Services to WCF](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-migrate-ajax-enabled-aspnet-web-services-to-wcf.md): Learn more about: How to: Migrate AJAX-Enabled ASP.NET Web Services to WCF

## Auditing

- [Auditing](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/auditing-security-events.md): Learn more about: Auditing Security Events
- [How to: Audit Security Events](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-audit-wcf-security-events.md): Learn more about: How to: Audit Windows Communication Foundation Security Events

## Authentication

- [Authentication](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/authentication-in-wcf.md): Learn about several mechanisms in WCF that provide authentication, such as Windows authentication, X.509 certificates, and user name and password.
- [How to: Use the ASP.NET Membership Provider](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-use-the-aspnet-membership-provider.md): Learn how the ASP.NET membership provider supports websites that let users create a user name and password for access without having a Windows domain account.
- [How to: Use Multiple Security Tokens of the Same Type](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-use-multiple-security-tokens-of-the-same-type.md): Learn more about: How to: Use Multiple Security Tokens of the Same Type
- [Service Identity and Authentication](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/service-identity-and-authentication.md): Learn about the endpoint identity of a service, a value generated from the service WSDL, which WCF uses to authenticate the service.
- [Security Negotiation and Timeouts](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/security-negotiation-and-timeouts.md): Learn more about: Security Negotiation and Timeouts
- [Debugging Windows Authentication Errors](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/debugging-windows-authentication-errors.md): Learn more about: Debug Windows authentication errors
- [Using Multiple Authentication Schemes with WCF](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-multiple-authentication-schemes-with-wcf.md): Learn more about: Using Multiple Authentication Schemes with WCF

## Authorization

- [Authorization](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/authorization-in-wcf.md): Learn more about: Authorization in WCF
- [Access Control Mechanisms](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/access-control-mechanisms.md): Learn more about: Access Control Mechanisms
- [How to: Use the ASP.NET Role Provider with a Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-use-the-aspnet-role-provider-with-a-service.md): Learn how to use the ASP.NET role provider with a service
- [How to: Use the ASP.NET Authorization Manager Role Provider with a Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-use-the-aspnet-authorization-manager-role-provider-with-a-service.md): Learn how to use the ASP.NET Authorization Manager Role Provider with a Service
- [Delegation and Impersonation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/delegation-and-impersonation-with-wcf.md): Learn about the methods of impersonation and delegation that WCF uses to restrict client access to the resources of a service domain.
